text: Wife and I were staying near by and decided to try butter and spice based on a friendâ€™s recommendation. The food was very very good. We had butter chicken, mutton Bbryani, and a lamb skewer. Everything came out perfect. Would go again next time we are in singapore.

Great food and lovely service staff! Ordered the holy butter chicken, palak paneer, garlic naan and kashmiri naan. So hearty and delicious ðŸ¥¹ We also ordered galub jamun for dessert and the staff generously gave it to us on the house. 10/10 would go back to try the other dishes again~ Loved the wall mural too.

Our usual go-to for some Indian cuisine fix!
Been here way too many times, but still never gets old! Just look at how we wiped out our dinner.

If itâ€™s your first time here and youâ€™re unsure of what to order, just order whatever we ordered in the attached receipt! Quality Indian cuisine at just $20 per person! You will not be disappointed.

Service as usual, is top notch. We were extremely well taken care of by all the staff working that night. Always a fast and pleasant experience here at Butter N Spice ðŸ¥° We were also treated to free dessert to end off our delightful dinner.

If you love Indian food, this is definitely a must go!

Had a fantastic dining experience at Butter & Spice! The mutton biryani was absolutely deliciousâ€”perfectly spiced, fragrant, and with tender, flavorful mutton. The portion was generous and well-balanced.

Service was excellent as wellâ€”the staff was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. The warm hospitality really added to the experience. Definitely a place Iâ€™d return to for a great Indian meal!

Went on a calm Sat afternoon. Freshly prepared super hot food. Loved the traditional taste. Especially the Dal makahni. Ambiance is pleasurable. Suppose good for dining in groups, small parties. It's a little tricky to find if you come from Marina Parade's side, possibly easier when approaching from Katong road.
